verbs.description: As [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: readied] [ARG2: for his highly anticipated summit with North Korea 's Kim Jong Un some nearly 10,000 miles away from the eastern seaboard in Singapore] , his adult sons celebrated the opening of something much closer to home .

As President Donald Trump readied for his [ARGM-ADV: highly] [V: anticipated] [ARG1: summit] with North Korea 's Kim Jong Un some nearly 10,000 miles away from the eastern seaboard in Singapore , his adult sons celebrated the opening of something much closer to home .
